html:
4.13.18  1:51 pm   4.12.18  7:22 pm Would you just do keys and sing (like your improv) then?

     i will do some of that, but i will also have a band with me

4.13.18  12:58 pm   why did you kill JFK

     that's a good question but i did not

4.13.18  12:11 pm   Why did you say "yeah, I went there" after saying "in Alabama you can do what you wanna"?

     it seemed like a useful interjection at that point in the song. it's the second verse and it's a very repetetive verse and everyone gets the point of what's going on now, so it's good to look for ways to spice things up, lest the boring-o-meter should start to heat up

4.13.18  12:09 pm   Are there any questions that you don't know the answer to?

     yes

4.13.18  11:49 am   Other than music, words, colors, images, stories, voices, language, and movement, what else are you passionate about?

     problem solving

4.13.18  11:31 am   Have you ever had a creative block, and if so how did you get out of it?

     think outside the block

4.13.18  9:46 am   My parents don't let me leave the house. :(

     maybe you can escape when they are not home

4.13.18  8:37 am   What would you like a press release to say about you as a person? About you as a musician?

     nothing

4.13.18  8:35 am   Do you write your music like everyone else?

     yes and no

4.13.18  7:52 am   4.8.18  8:41 am
3.18.18  1:30 am
wow I wrote I IV vi V wrong twice

     that's why i prefer to use arabic numbers 1234 instead of roman (I, II, III, IV). with the roman numbers i can't tell the difference between 4 and 6 without staring at it for 15 minutes

4.13.18  7:36 am   Discovering chords is as simple as just listening to the chord, and then finding it on your instrument right?

     sure. or someone else's instrument

4.13.18  7:20 am   Have you ever reused a live action video you recorded of yourself playing either drums or keys or do you record a new video for each new video you're working on?

     i adhere to musical accuracy when doing the clips, so re-using them for the wrong song would not work

4.13.18  6:50 am   I don't want to be around people but i'm forced to. what do i do?

     flip it up, try to force someone else to do something for a change

4.13.18  6:34 am   How do you read sheet music

     how do you read words and sentences

4.13.18  6:20 am   is the next video written for someone?

     no

      who?

4.13.18  2:15 am   nothing makes sense!

     no it doesn't

4.13.18  1:38 am   oh no wear is my pink tutu

      that's a good question, and i don't see it hear

4.13.18  1:21 am   if you created a patreon i would support you. have you considered something like that?

     yes

4.13.18  12:14 am   4.12.18  5:59 pm Hey! Live action and "the other one" = genre = your genres! You admitted it!

     admitted what

     I am telling Claudette!

4.12.18  11:04 pm   Is there a style of music in the past years that influenced you musical style?

     styles are in the imagination any way. i prefer to just skip straight to the imagination

4.12.18  10:08 pm   Other than music, what else are you passionate about?

     words, colors, images, stories, voices, language, movement, and more

4.12.18  9:56 pm   what is your favorite type of legal document

     the bill

4.12.18  9:50 pm   I'm trying to make a little song or something on my kepboard with about 6-10 chords. I'm kind of new to the keyboard and not that familiar with chords, but I really enjoy getting involved in making music. What can you recommend I do to make a decent, short song?

     i will give you the same advice that was given to me long ago, which is no advice at all. you might not like it, but it was the best advice i ever received, and it led me to be who i am today

4.12.18  9:03 pm   How does a picky person pick something?

     very carefully

4.12.18  9:00 pm   Is it possible to play the sitar while standing?

     i'm not sure

4.12.18  8:34 pm   I've never heard anyone say the word "obsolesce", would that make it an obsolescent word in spoken English?

     obsolete

4.12.18  8:31 pm   What should I do if my parents think that I'm a disappointment even though I feel like I'm doing the right thing? 

     continue doing the right thing, and maybe take some time out once in a while to send them a greeting card

4.12.18  8:23 pm   what do you do when you pour too much of something (i.e. sauce or pretzels)

     pour more, and try to go for a world record

4.12.18  8:15 pm   How many hott dogs do you think you could eat in an hour

     how about 0

4.12.18  8:14 pm   what is the "monkey fun" in history of japan referring to? sorry if this has been asked already

     sarugaku

4.12.18  7:55 pm   what is your opinion on the American system of electoral judges?

     i just wonder who gets to be the judge of who gets to be a judge

4.12.18  7:22 pm   If you ever perform songs live, would you use a backing track?

     absolutely not

4.12.18  6:38 pm   What was the question Damian Maymdiam skipped?

     do you no de wae

4.12.18  6:36 pm   hey bill i really like you music, how do you come up it?

     using my imagination

4.12.18  6:29 pm   I got into the habit of using a "-" to indicate minor chords. Is that OK?

     yes

4.12.18  6:28 pm   Can you stop with the mind control thing?

     never

4.12.18  6:07 pm   what's your approach to recovering (emotionally, creatively, & such) when you feel you've really failed at something?

     talk it out

     also your recent tweets make it seem like you're reading my mind, which is kind of weird but also makes me feel seen so...thanks.

4.12.18  5:59 pm   is the new video live action or is it the other kind

     both

4.12.18  5:25 pm   i havent been born yet

     fair enough

4.12.18  5:03 pm   can you teach me how to do quadratics

     i will do it when i get a chance

4.12.18  4:44 pm   I'm boarding a plane and by the time I land you better release something ok? 

     i will work on it the entire time, how does that sound

4.12.18  4:09 pm   how can you identify chords by ear easier?

     start by writing chord charts for all your favorite songs. get the chords by unpausing-pausing very quickly. it's best to work with an offline version of the file on a simple player, so that it can unpause and pause very quickly. just listen for every note you can, and identify them on your instrument. after doing this for a while and writing down chord charts for a few songs, you will become better and better aquainted for how people are using chords in music, and soon you won't have to listen to the individual notes anymore, it will be like hearing a sentence and just knowing it without thinking about the individual letters or even the words

4.12.18  3:29 pm   So you love doing everything so much that you sing songs about it and thats why you love doing it and you love sharing it because this relatable thing is all fun? 

     yes and more

4.12.18  2:46 pm   Llama or alpaca?

     is what

4.12.18  1:51 pm   Am i valid?

     i think there is a buzz feed test you can take

4.12.18  1:14 pm   What is you're opinion on Mark the Zuccerborg takeing the information of the american population through the popular social media outlet, FaceBook?

     sounds like fun

4.12.18  12:33 pm   im in your house

     the joke's on you i don't have a house

4.12.18  11:52 am   Why are tritones called tritones? I know it's the sharp 4, and it divides the octave in half.. but where does the "tri" (or 3) part come in? 

     i guess it refers to 3 whole-tones? or 3 whole steps? it's a weird name but i am thankful that it has a name, because it is much easier than always saying 'augmented 4th' or 'diminished 5th' and never being sure which one to say because they are both equally likely and also all of them are both

4.12.18  11:47 am   surprise me?

     i will see what i can do

4.12.18  11:37 am   Is consciousness an illusion?

     if it is then i don't know why we need the word illusion
